message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you, and I'm asking for $11,000. What are your thoughts?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I do see the value in this product, $11,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500. Would you be open to that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I believe the product's value justifies a higher price. Would you consider $10,500?
